original_text: And shall receive the reward of unrighteousness, as they that count it pleasure to riot in the day time. Spots they are and blemishes, sporting themselves with their own deceivings while they feast with you;
korean_text: 불의의 값으로 불의를 당하며 낮에 즐기고 노는 것을 기쁘게 여기는 자들이니 점과 흠이라 너희와 함께 연회할 때에 그들의 속임수로 즐기고 놀며

sentences.original_text: And shall receive the reward of unrighteousness,
as they that count it pleasure
to riot in the day time.
sporting themselves with their own deceivings
